channel.title: Runescape Guide Help
channel.description:
basically i need detailed help with configuring what the
1. roidscape guide says and does when you click. 2. what the make-over mage does when you click. 3. what the combat instructor does when you click. 4. what the magic instructor does when you click.
i think these are all very similar.. PLEASE BE DETAILED!
EDIT: this is a cheezscape based 317 running off of my personal computer with windows XP service pack 3

item.title: Runescape Guide Help
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

i tried this on my old source…doesnt work…and i tried on my new source then i relized…lol the mage already works but thanks anyways…idk about my last source it was a bad one

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Guide Help
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

Search

case 155:

Then under the last break;

You can declare what a npc does, EX:

if(NPCID == 599){ showInterface(3559); apset = true; }

This would make it so when you clicked the make-over mage, it would show the charecter design interface. I think you have the idea on what to do now.

Read full topic
